Reference

Continuous Distribution Data Generating Functions

Functions that generate random data from continuous distributions and return tibbles

tidy_burr()

Tidy Randomly Generated Exponential Distribution Tibble

Tidy Randomly Generated F Distribution Tibble

tidy_gamma()

Tidy Randomly Generated Gamma Distribution Tibble

Functions that generate random data from discrete distributions and return tibbles

Tidy Randomly Generated Hypergeometric Distribution Tibble

Tidy Randomly Generated Negative Binomial Distribution Tibble

Empirical Data Functions

tidy_empirical()

Tidy Empirical

Multiple Distribution Tibble

Generate multiple simulations of the same distribution with different parameters

tidy_combine_distributions()

Combine Multiple Tidy Distributions of Different Types

tidy_multi_single_dist()

Generate Multiple Tidy Distributions of a single type

Parameter Estimation Functions

Functions that help to estimate parameters from raw data.

util_beta_param_estimate()

Estimate Beta Parameters

Random Walk Functions

Functions that generate random walk data and return tibbles

tidy_random_walk()

Tidy Random Walk

Plotting Functions

Functions that generate plots of the tidy_ distribution functions.

tidy_autoplot()

Automatic Plot of Density Data

tidy_multi_dist_autoplot()

Automatic Plot of Multi Dist Data

tidy_random_walk_autoplot()

Automatic Plot of Random Walk Data

Statistic Functions

Functions that return a statistic

tidy_kurtosis_vec()

Compute Kurtosis of a Vector

tidy_range_statistic()

Get the range statistic

tidy_skewness_vec()

Compute Skewness of a Vector

Table Functions

Functions that generate tibbles

tidy_distribution_summary_tbl()

Tidy Distribution Summary Statistics Tibble
